welcome: We’re a web design and development agency in New Brunswick, Canada, specializing in beautiful, high-performing websites for businesses locally and globally.
welcome2: We're a creative web design and development agency building beautiful, high-performing websites for local and global businesses.
thankYouDescription: We have received your message and will get back to you shortly.
aboutUsText1: At MadeWithLux, we believe that design is more than just making things look pretty. It's about creating websites that not only look amazing but also work effectively to help your business stand out, connect with your customers, and grow over time. We focus on crafting digital experiences that drive results and make a real difference for your brand.
aboutUsText2: We aim to create websites that truly represent your brand's unique identity. We design digital experiences that connect with your audience on a personal level, engage them effectively, and ultimately support your business goals. Whether it's boosting sales, increasing brand awareness, or fostering deeper relationships with your customers, our websites are built to help you bring your business vision to life.
aboutUsText3: When you work with us, you’re getting more than just a website. You’re getting a team committed to making your brand stand out and thrive online.
A stunning project that showcases creati: A stunning project that showcases creativity.
A sleek and modern web design project.
A project that blends aesthetics and fun: A project that blends aesthetics and functionality.
Project One Case Study: Project One was designed to enhance user experience by simplifying navigation and improving visual appeal. It resulted in a 30% increase in engagement.
Project Two Case Study: Project Two aimed at creating a dynamic e-commerce platform. With a focus on seamless transactions, the project increased sales by 20%.
Project Three Case Study: Project Three combined branding and UI/UX to create a memorable digital experience. It improved customer satisfaction by 25%.

howItWorksDesc: From consultation to launch, here's how we bring your website design to life.
step1Desc: Our web design process starts with a call to understand your goals and challenges.
step2Desc: We prepare a custom web design strategy aligned with your business objectives.
step3Desc: Our team designs a modern prototype that brings your web design vision to life.
step4Desc: We present the web design for your review to ensure it aligns with your vision.
step5Desc: We develop and test your website to ensure it's ready to support your business.
step6Desc: With your approval, your new website goes live and is ready for the world.

portfolio.title: Website Design for an Event Planning & Party Rental Company
portfolio.description: Made it easy for customers to explore services and book rentals online.
portfolio.caseStudyDesc: Through strategic web design and thoughtful development, we helped Events by Lolar overcome key challenges in customer engagement and service presentation. By creating a clean, intuitive user experience and clearly showcasing their services, we improved how potential clients interacted with the brand, leading to stronger trust and better conversion opportunities.

gallery.challenges: Poor web design made it difficult for customers to browse and rent items online, resulting in a frustrating and inefficient booking experience.
gallery.solutions: We crafted a user-friendly web design that transformed the rental store into a seamless experience, making it easy for customers to browse and book with just a few clicks.
gallery.results: The updated web design simplified online rentals for customers and reduced unnecessary back-and-forth, streamlining the rental process

gallery.challenges: The initial website design did not effectively communicate the full range of event planning services, leaving potential clients uncertain about the value offered.
gallery.solutions: We used strategic web design to create a dedicated, visually engaging section that highlights event planning services, showcases past work professionally, and makes it easy for customers to book an appointment.
gallery.results: The new web design improved how services are presented, making it easier for clients to understand the business’s offerings and helping attract and engage more prospective customers.

gallery.challenges: The previous web design lacked a central platform for sharing valuable content like event planning tips, trends, and inspiration, limiting opportunities to attract and engage potential clients.
gallery.solutions: Through strategic web design, we added a dynamic blog section where the team can regularly share insights, trends, and event ideas, positioning the brand as a trusted authority in the industry.
gallery.results: The blog, integrated through thoughtful web design, helps build trust with visitors by showcasing expertise and making it easier for potential clients to connect and choose the services.

portfolio.title: Web design solution for AI prompt application.
portfolio.description: An open-source AI prompting tool for the modern world to discover, create, and share creative prompts.
portfolio.caseStudyDesc: This project empowers creators in the AI space through modern web design and development. By building an accessible, open-source tool focused on intuitive design, we helped transform an idea into a collaborative, community-driven platform shaping the future of AI creativity.

gallery.challenges: There was no visually engaging, user-friendly platform with thoughtful web design for discovering and sharing AI prompts, especially one that caters to a modern, creative audience.
gallery.solutions: We crafted the web design and development for an open-source web app where users can effortlessly explore, create, and share AI prompts. The interface emphasizes simplicity, community, and creativity, featuring built-in tools for managing and showcasing prompts.
gallery.results: Users now have a centralized, intuitively designed web space to organize, reuse, and discover AI prompts, saving time and fostering more consistent creativity.

portfolio.title: Web Design for a Luxury Fashion Brand
portfolio.description: A stylish and user-friendly fashion website built to attract customers, showcase products, and increase online sales.
portfolio.caseStudyDesc: This web design project focused on helping a luxury fashion brand create a strong online presence that feels premium and easy to use. The goal was to turn visitors into customers by making the shopping experience simple, elegant, and trustworthy.

gallery.challenges: The brand needed a website that looked high-end and professional, but also worked smoothly for everyday users who just wanted to shop with ease and confidence.
gallery.solutions: We designed a clean and modern fashion website that’s mobile-friendly, easy to navigate, and built with sales in mind. From the product pages to the checkout process, everything was created to keep visitors engaged and guide them smoothly toward completing a purchase.
gallery.results: The new website offers a stylish and intuitive shopping experience that appeals to both fashion-forward and practical users.

gallery.challenges: The client needed to build trust with first-time visitors, especially since it’s a new premium brand selling high-value fashion pieces online.
gallery.solutions: We added trust-building sections such as clear shipping and return information, and visible contact details. These elements were strategically placed on the home page to reduce hesitation and increase buyer confidence.
gallery.results: Shoppers now feel more secure when browsing and buying, leading to stronger credibility and improved conversion rates.

gallery.challenges: The brand lacked a digital space that properly communicated its unique story, values, and visual identity.
gallery.solutions: We crafted a visually compelling About page and integrated storytelling elements across the homepage. High-quality imagery, bold typography, and consistent branding helped reinforce the luxury feel.
gallery.results: The website now reflects the essence of the brand, creating a deeper connection with visitors and helping them understand what sets it apart.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website Design for a Software Developer
portfolio.description: A professional, easy-to-navigate website that highlights their work, experience, and writing.
portfolio.caseStudyDesc: This website design project focused on bridging the gap between technical depth and visual storytelling. By reimagining how portfolio projects are presented, we created a more inclusive, professional, and impactful experience that better communicates the developer's skills and value.

gallery.challenges: While each project the client has worked on had a detailed README on GitHub, the portfolio lacked a visual presentation, making it less accessible to non-technical visitors and potential collaborators.
gallery.solutions: We crafted the web design and development of a dedicated portfolio section that transforms GitHub projects into engaging showcases — featuring visuals, concise summaries, and key tech stacks, tailored for both technical and non-technical audiences.
gallery.results: The improved web design provides a clear, visually rich portfolio overview, enabling visitors to quickly grasp the developer’s project scope, impact, and relevance at a glance.

portfolio.title: Custom Website Design for a Bakery Business
portfolio.description: A warm, inviting website design that highlights their work and lets customers place custom cake orders with ease.
portfolio.caseStudyDesc: We focused on streamlining the customer journey, from visual inspiration to custom orders. The result is a beautiful, functional website design that not only showcases their products but also simplifies the ordering process, helping the business run more efficiently while delivering a premium experience.

gallery.challenges: Customers couldn’t easily explore the full range of cakes and pastries, making it difficult to decide or place orders.
gallery.solutions: We created a web design that has a visually rich menu that elegantly showcases all available baked goods, organized for easy browsing.
gallery.results: The enhanced product display enables customers to browse and place orders effortlessly, creating a smoother, more enjoyable user experience.

gallery.challenges: The ordering process was manual and inefficient, requiring back-and-forth communication to capture order details accurately.
gallery.solutions: We developed a comprehensive, easy-to-use custom order form with fields for size, flavor, design preferences, and special requests, all handled on the website.
gallery.results: The business now receives complete, accurate orders from the website while saving time on admin, reducing errors, and improving customer satisfaction.

faqIntro: Answers to common questions our clients have about our web design services.

faq.question: What results can I expect from working with a professional web designer?
faq.answer: You can expect a website design that reflects your brand, attracts the right audience, and helps convert visitors into leads with a strong focus on results like growth, credibility, and better visibility online.

faq.question: Do you only work with businesses in New Brunswick?
faq.answer: No, while we’re based in New Brunswick, Canada, we work with businesses across Canada and internationally. Location is not a barrier.

faq.question: How much does web design cost?
faq.answer: Every business is unique, and so are their web design needs. We don’t offer one-size-fits-all pricing, instead, we provide a free consultation to understand your goals, project scope, and budget. Then, we’ll give you a clear, tailored quote that fits your business needs.

faq.question: How long does a web design project take?
faq.answer: Most web design projects take between 4 to 8 weeks. This depends on your goals, project complexity, and how quickly content is ready.

faq.question: Will my website be mobile-friendly and SEO-optimized?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Every website we design is responsive on all devices and follows SEO best practices to help you rank better in search engines.

faq.question: Can you update or maintain my website after it’s launched?
faq.answer: Yes. We offer website maintenance and support packages to keep your site fast, secure, and up to date, so you can focus on running your business.

faq.question: Can you help with branding or redesigning our current website?
faq.answer: Yes. Whether you're starting from scratch or rebranding, we offer branding and web design services that will align with your brand and speak to your ideal audience.

toronto.heroSubtitle: Helping Toronto businesses grow with high-converting websites.

about.heading: What We Do for Toronto Businesses
about.para: We provide web solutions tailored to Toronto’s diverse and fast-paced market.

services.title: Real Estate Web Development in Toronto
services.description: Custom website design for Toronto real estate agents, brokers, and agencies featuring MLS integration, lead capture, and high-speed performance.

services.title: Toronto E-commerce Website Design
services.description: We build conversion-focused e-commerce websites designed for businesses in Toronto and all over Canada optimized for Shopify, WooCommerce, and mobile-first shopping experiences.

services.title: Bilingual & Multilingual Website Design
services.description: Reach Toronto’s diverse audience with professionally designed websites in English, French, and more fully optimized for accessibility.

services.title: Toronto SEO Web Design Services
services.description: Get found on Google with search engine optimized web design, we target competitive Toronto keywords to increase your visibility and inbound leads.

services.title: Website Maintenance & Ongoing Support
services.description: We offer reliable, fast maintenance for businesses based in Toronto and all over Canada. This includes updates, backups, uptime monitoring, and security patches.

services.title: Custom Web Development Features
services.description: Need something unique? From booking systems to dashboards, we build custom website features that help your Toronto business grow and scale.

faq.question: How much does it cost to design a website for my Toronto business?
faq.answer: Every business is unique, and so are their web design needs. We don’t offer one-size-fits-all pricing, instead, we provide a free consultation to understand your goals, project scope, and budget. Then, we’ll give you a clear, tailored quote that fits your business needs.

faq.question: How long will it take to build my website?
faq.answer: Most websites take 3 to 6 weeks depending on the scope, number of pages, and revisions. We offer faster timelines for urgent projects and will give you a clear project schedule from day one.

faq.question: Can you help optimize my website for Toronto local SEO?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in local SEO for Toronto businesses, ensuring your website ranks for the right local keywords and appears in Google Maps and local search results.

faq.question: What platforms do you use to build websites?
faq.answer: We build websites using WordPress, Webflow, Shopify, and custom solutions depending on your business goals, scalability, and budget.

faq.question: Do you offer ongoing website maintenance and support?
faq.answer: Yes. We offer maintenance plans for businesses in Toronto and Canada that include regular updates, backups, performance checks, and security monitoring so you can focus on running your business.

faq.question: Can I update the website myself after it’s launched?
faq.answer: Yes. We build user-friendly websites and provide training or documentation so you can make updates easily. We’re also here to help if you’d prefer us to manage updates for you.

faq.question: Do you work with startups and small businesses?
faq.answer: Yes, we love working with Toronto startups and small business owners. We offer flexible solutions that scale as your business grows.

faq.question: Do you offer bilingual or multilingual websites for Toronto’s diverse audience?
faq.answer: Yes, we create bilingual and multilingual websites in English, French, and other languages to help you reach more of Toronto’s multicultural population.
